name: A NIGHT LIKE TONIGHT
description:
A nautical adventure involving a compelling voice, particularly impassable rocks, and carnivorous aquatic mammals.

Collaboration for Global Game Jam 2017 under the theme "Waves".

--*--

Version 1.3 with bug fixes and additional routes coming soon.

Feedback is welcome! For bug reports, please leave a comment or email tocorviday@gmail.com.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move
Spacebar/Enter - Progress through dialogue
Right Shift - Pull up radio again

Movement is currently disabled during dialogue.

Credits:

CURRENT VERSIONS: Mac 1.2, Windows 1.2

CONCEPT/STORY: Wally-S (@ntagonistic)
PROGRAMMING: Sandra Honigman (@sanmagia)
ART: Alicia Feng (@ghostsofcrows)

MUSIC: 25 Préludes dans tous les tons majeurs et mineurs, Op. 31: No. 8 - Charles - Valentin Alkan
